column5: Determines how many consecutive items shall be consumed.
References one of the input components to the process to be (partially) consumed by the CollatingItem element. This Component SHALL be an input of the Feeding process.
Named orientation of the CollatingItem relative to the input coordinate system. For details see ?Table 2.1 Matrices and Orientation values for describing the orientation of a Component.
Transformation of the CollatingItem relative to the input coordinate system.
This parameter specifies the object that SHALL be manipulated in orientation/transformation, and it is important to determine the sequence of stack items after flipping.
